description: Recognition, prevention & management of injuries from physical activity; mechanisms of sports injuries; preventive & protective techniques; special conditions in sports medicine. This course had the previous code of HMST3052 which can be viewed in the archived area within the Course and Program site http://www.uq.edu.au/study/archive/index.html
prerequisites: ANAT1005 + HMST2730 or PHYL2730 + First Aid Certificate
